Seaweed is a Farming plant grown at level 23 Farming. Seaweed is grown by planting a seaweed spore in the seaweed patch in the underwater area of Fossil Island. Players can pay Mernia to protect this patch by giving her 200 numulites.

Once fully grown, which takes approximately 40 minutes, players will be able to harvest giant seaweed. A minimum of three can be collected per patch, with the average being around 15–30 (if super or ultracompost is used; 8-16 if compost is not used), depending on one's Farming level. Specifically, the patch has three "lives" by default, and each tier of compost adds one extra. The chance to not consume a life upon harvest is 64.1% at level 23 and 82% at level 99, using linear interpolation for other levels.[1] Magic secateurs and the farming cape do not have an effect.[2]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 12 October 2018. (Archived from the original on 28 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "3 [lives] as standard. Add 1-3 for the tier of compost you used. The chance scales from 59% - 82% of NOT taking a life when you get an item, as your level goes from 1-99."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 25 June 2018. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "No, doesn't look like it. I guess you weren't expected to have them equipped down there."

'''Seaweed''' is a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 23 Farming. Seaweed is grown by planting a [[seaweed spore]] in the [[seaweed patch]] in the [[underwater]] area of [[Fossil Island]]. Players can pay [[Mernia]] to protect this patch by giving her 200 [[numulite]]s.

Once fully grown, which takes approximately 40 minutes, players will be able to harvest [[giant seaweed]]. A minimum of three can be collected per patch, with the average being around 15–30 (if [[Supercompost|super]] or [[ultracompost]] is used; 8-16 if compost is not used), depending on one's Farming level. Specifically, the patch has three "lives" by default, and each tier of compost adds one extra. The chance to not consume a life upon harvest is 64.1% at level 23 and 82% at level 99, using linear interpolation for other levels.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1050735300119617536|date=12 October 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/ifgEO|archivedate=28 May 2020|quote=3 [lives] as standard. Add 1-3 for the tier of compost you used. The chance scales from 59% - 82% of NOT taking a life when you get an item, as your level goes from 1-99.}} [[Magic secateurs]] and the [[farming cape]] '''do not''' have an effect.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1011197294019072000|date=25 June 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/lzN9k|archivedate=29 May 2020|quote=No, doesn't look like it. I guess you weren't expected to have them equipped down there.}}
